specific.title: Very High Risk
specific.content: LDL-C goal is < 55 mg/dL and 50% reduction from baseline

step1.title: Step 1: Evidence of established Atherosclerotic CardioVascular Disease (ASCVD)?
step1.subtitle: Select all that apply:

step2.title: Step 2: Any of the following risk factors?
step2.subtitle: Select all that apply:

options.option2: Undergone revascularization procedures (PCI, CABG, or other arterial revascularization)
options.option5: Significant plaque on angiography or CT scan (usually at least 50% stenosis)
options.option6: Significant plaque on carotid ultrasound (usually at least 50% stenosis)
